user.title: Siedle Setup
user.description: You will be redirected to scan the QR code from your Siedle app.

qr_scan.title: Scan QR Code
qr_scan.description:
Please scan the QR code from your Siedle app using your phone's camera.

After scanning, you will be redirected back automatically.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to Siedle. Please check the QR code data.
error.invalid_qr: Invalid QR code data. Please try again.
error.unknown: Unknown error occurred. Please try again.

abort.already_configured: This Siedle device is already configured.

general.title: General Settings
general.description:
Configure basic integration settings.

**FCM Push** is the most reliable method for doorbell detection (recommended!).

data.fcm_enabled: Enable FCM Push (recommended for doorbell detection!)

external_sip.title: External SIP Server
external_sip.description:
Configure an external SIP server (e.g., FritzBox, Asterisk) for call forwarding.

Example hosts: fritz.box, asterisk.local, sipgate.de

call_forwarding.title: Call Forwarding
call_forwarding.description:
Configure call forwarding between door station and external phones.

**Forward to number**: Comma-separated list of numbers (e.g., **620,**621,**9). First number tried first, then next on timeout.
**Forward from number**: Number allowed to call the door.
**Timeout**: Seconds per target before trying next.

data.forward_from_number: Allow calls from this number to door

forward_schedule.title: Forwarding Schedule
forward_schedule.description:
Only forward calls during specific times and days.
If disabled, calls are always forwarded (when forwarding is enabled).

Time format: HH:MM (24h). Supports midnight crossing (e.g., 22:00 - 06:00).

dtmf_settings.title: DTMF Door Opener
dtmf_settings.description:
Allow opening the door or toggling the light by pressing phone keys (DTMF) during an active call.

For example, press # to open the door while talking to a visitor.

announcement.title: Wait Announcement
announcement.description:
Play a 'please wait' announcement to the door station visitor while the call is being forwarded.

Provide a WAV file (8kHz, 16-bit, mono) in the config folder. If no file is set, a short beep tone will be played.

data.announcement_file: WAV file path (relative to config, e.g., siedle/please_wait.wav)

recording.title: Recording
recording.description: Configure automatic recording when doorbell rings.

fritzbox.title: Fritz!Box Integration
fritzbox.description:
Ring DECT phones connected to a Fritz!Box when the doorbell rings.

Uses TR-064 protocol. Requires a Fritz!Box user with 'Phone' permission.

Special numbers: **9 = all phones, **610 = DECT 1, **611 = DECT 2, etc.
